column1: Turkey goolash (turkey burger, tomatoes, cabbage, broccoli, bell pepper, onion, etc)
Got my garden for spring started, get a phone…. yeah, that about sums up yesterday.
Today I’ve eaten one serving of 0% Fage with blackberries.
For dinner I’ll probably heat up the leftover goolash.
28 days left to lose 25lbs, I think I can do it as long as I don’t cheat anymore! last week really set me back.

I try to avoid it (most times). Recently I shared in a bio about myself for the studio I teach at that I’ve lost over 150 lbs. Since that I’ve had a lot of “exactly how much have you lost???”. “A lot” doesn’t seem satisfying and when I tell them “as of Sunday it’s 172” they stare at me in disbelief.
I want people to know, because people who have a lot of weight to lose should know it’s possible without surgeries or diet pills or giving up food all together.

At the same time, its hard to admit out loud that I was that in denial of my health. It’s crazy to think that I waited so long to do what I needed to do to get started on a healthy path. It’s embarrassing and painful to admit that all out loud summed up in a number.
I’m proud of who I am now, who I taught to become. I’m still a work in progress though. If 172 makes someone realize - I can too! Then I guess it’s a number I’m going to have to say more often ….
I’m currently 164.2 down from 305.4 thanks to weight watchers!
